Interface Location

public interface Location
Location of a resource by name.

The concepts applied:

  1. Location -- resource name
  2. Container -- container of resources, a directory.
  3. Content -- resource content, a file.

Locations of type "container" and locations of type "content" are intended to be mutually exclusive.

When classloader related, then getName() and #toString() can be applied directly to ClassLoader.

Note that implementations are expected to implement Object.toString() by returning the resource name as provided by getName().

This is immutable.

Since:
2025-07-01
Author:
Morten Sabroe Mortensen
